name: Round House
description:
ROUND HOUSE A bara life-simulation game.

Lu Yiwei, your former classmate, is preparing for his postgraduate examination. Since there is no quiet place to study for the test, you, as his friend, introduce him to your company's new product, ROUND-HOUSE.

For the next ten days, you will organize his life as an observer.

Maybe you can help him get into graduate school, or help him go down some other path...

Please note that this game is currently only available in Chinese and Google translated English Please download DLC file and unzip it and put it into the WWW folder to cover it.
